thread.title: Todd Masson's fishing forecast for Oct. 2-4: Podcast
thread.title_full: Todd Masson's fishing forecast for Oct. 2-4: Podcast | NOLA.com

author: Todd Masson, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Todd Masson's fishing forecast for Oct. 2-4: Podcast
text:
Thursday begins the best month of the year in South Louisiana, and it's looking like this October is going to be a good one for speckled-trout anglers. After enduring the dreaded September transition, anglers and guides across the coast have reported good numbers of fish in the marshes this week.
That's great news for the long-term, but in the short run, anglers may have to manage their expectations for this weekend, thanks to some really stiff winds in the forecast behind this cool front.
Those who fish smart, however, should still be able to put some fish in the boat.
We take a look at the details in this week's podcast:
